original: * // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: * // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: aa bhi dh'a na sh'a stra bi shva lo tsa na mi tya sa r'a bhi dh'a na mu ktya bal'i n'a ma /
analyzed: aa bhi dh'a na sh'a stra bi shva lo tsa na mi tya sa r'a bhi dh'a na mu ktya bal'i n'a ma /

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

analyzed: mngon brjod kyi bstan bcos sna tshogs gsal rab zhes pa ming gzhan mu tig phreng ba zhes bya ba /

original: bla ma dang 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bla ma dang 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the guru and Mañjughoṣa.

original: bcom ldan 'das dang de'i chos rgyal bar gyur cig dbyangs can rab tu dang par mdzod //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das dang de'i chos rgyal bar gyur cig dbyangs can rab tu dang par mdzod //
translated: May the Bhagavān and his Dharma become victorious. May Sarasvatī be pure.

original: skye 'gro rnams la bde ba 'byung zhing dregs dang mi dge ba las drang bar mdzod //
analyzed: skye 'gro rnams la bde ba 'byung zhing dregs dang mi dge ba las drang bar mdzod //
translated: May beings experience happiness and be led away from arrogance and nonvirtue.

original: bdag gis gang zhig legs par sbyar ba'i bum pa mchog las byung ba'i chu 'dir yang //
analyzed: bdag gis gang zhig legs par sbyar ba'i bum pa mchog las byung ba'i chu 'dir yang //
translated: In this water that has emerged from the supreme vase that I have properly prepared,

original: ci zhes lhags par byed pa don la mkhas pa rnams kyis kun tu 'jug par mdzod /
analyzed: ci zhes lhags par byed pa don la mkhas pa rnams kyis kun tu 'jug par mdzod /
translated: The wise should always engage in this, asking, What is it?

original: 1 / sde tshan don du mtha' dag snying stobs la dad dpa' //
analyzed: 1 / sde tshan don du mtha' dag snying stobs la dad dpa' //
translated: The entire purpose of the class is to have faith in courage.

original: dpal ldan snyan ngag mkhan po thub pa'i sde zhes byung //
analyzed: dpal ldan snyan ngag mkhan po thub pa'i sde zhes byung //
translated: The glorious poet called Muniśrī

original: bdag gi rig pa'i gnas ni tshig ldan ngag snyan bcas //
analyzed: bdag gi rig pa'i gnas ni tshig ldan ngag snyan bcas //
translated: has the knowledge of the science of poetics, along with sweet speech.

original: grags ldan bstan bcos mtha' dag las ni rjes su bsdus /
analyzed: grags ldan bstan bcos mtha' dag las ni rjes su bsdus /
translated: He has collected from all the famous treatises

original: 2 / de phyir ngag gi rang bzhin ma lus pha rol gzigs gyur pa //
analyzed: 2 / de phyir ngag gi rang bzhin ma lus pha rol gzigs gyur pa //

original: sa gzhi la gnas 'dren pa rnams kyi yid brtan snod du gyur //
analyzed: sa gzhi la gnas 'dren pa rnams kyi yid brtan snod du gyur //
translated: and therefore has become an object of trust for the guides who dwell on the earth.

original: dpal ldan dpal 'dzin gyis ni snyan ngag mkhan mchog mtha' dag gis //
analyzed: dpal ldan dpal 'dzin gyis ni snyan ngag mkhan mchog mtha' dag gis //

original: sbyar ba'i de nyid bdud rtsi'i btung ba 'chi med dbyangs can ldan /
analyzed: sbyar ba'i de nyid bdud rtsi'i btung ba 'chi med dbyangs can ldan /

original: 3 / de ni phul byung snyan ngag mkhan gyi lam skyes brling ba can //
analyzed: 3 / de ni phul byung snyan ngag mkhan gyi lam skyes brling ba can //
translated: He is the one born on the path of excellent poetry, the one with a deep voice,

original: blo yi mig ldan bla mas bstan pa'i mig dang ldan pa yis //
analyzed: blo yi mig ldan bla mas bstan pa'i mig dang ldan pa yis //
translated: who has the eye of the mind, and who has the eye of the teacher's instructions.

original: sna tshogs snyan ngag mkhan dbang gis bkod mngon brjod mdzad rnams las //
analyzed: sna tshogs snyan ngag mkhan dbang gis bkod mngon brjod mdzad rnams las //

original: drangs te mig dang 'dra ba 'di ni sgron me'i mdzod lta bu //
analyzed: drangs te mig dang 'dra ba 'di ni sgron me'i mdzod lta bu //

analyzed: rtog ge dang bcas snyan ngag mkhan gyi lung skyes brling ba rnams //

analyzed: kun tu snang byas rig gnas rnams kyi grong du nges gnas shing //

analyzed: spobs pa ldan pa rnams kyi blo yi lam dang 'dres byas pas //
translated: And, mixed with the path of the minds of the eloquent,

analyzed: da ni 'di yis skye ngan rnams kyi tshig kyang bcom par 'gyur /
translated: Now this [treatise] will conquer the words of the wicked.🔽With effort, the path of the mind of the powerful vidyādharas is ascertained,

original: 5 /'bad pas dal bar gyur dang ma gyur ma lus rig pa dang // rig pa 'dzin pa stobs ldan rnams kyi blo la nges sbyar ba //🔽dri med rin chen koostu bha sata 'dir slar yang rlom dor nas //
analyzed: 5 /'bad pas dal bar gyur dang ma gyur ma lus rig pa dang // rig pa 'dzin pa stobs ldan rnams kyi blo la nges sbyar ba // dri med rin chen koostu bha sata 'dir slar yang rlom dor nas //

original: dpal @71a * //
analyzed: dpal @71a * //

analyzed: mo'i dpal yon bzhin du rgya chen kho lag mchis 'di la'o /

analyzed: 6 / klu yi dbang po yang dag gnas pa'i mdzod gyur rgya mtsho'i dbus //

analyzed: sna tshogs snyan ngag mkhan dbang kha yi nya phyis las byung ba //

analyzed: mkhas pa 'chi med kyis sprul dar gyi srad bu la brgyus nas //

analyzed: mu tig phreng ba bkod 'di snying la yang dag gzhag par mdzod / 7 /'dod chags bral ba'i dri bzangs kyi //

analyzed: snyan grags me tog ra ba ni //

translated: (He is) the bow, and the bow of the horn, and one who delights.

original: dung ni lnga skyes //
analyzed: dung ni lnga skyes //
translated: (He is) the conch, and one who is born of five.

original: rgyal ba'i dbyangs //🔽'di yi nor bu mtha' byed lag / de ni kostu bha ru bshad //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i dbyangs // 'di yi nor bu mtha' byed lag / de ni kostu bha ru bshad //
translated: (He is) Jina, and Jina-svara.🔽(He is) the one whose hand is the jewel, and the one who is the end.

original: stobs bzang dang ni rab 'phyad gsod //🔽stobs lha gshol mtshon gos sngon can //🔽thod ldan gshog can t'a las mtshan /
analyzed: stobs bzang dang ni rab 'phyad gsod // stobs lha gshol mtshon gos sngon can // thod ldan gshog can t'a las mtshan /
translated: (He is) Koṣṭhabhāru, and one who is called Balabhadra.🔽(He is) Balideva, and Halāyudha, and Nīla.🔽(He is) Śaṅkhin, and Pakṣin, and Tāla-lakṣaṇa.

original: (/ sa bdag byed/) gtun shing can dang stobs can dang // nam gru dga' byed /
analyzed: (/ sa bdag byed/) gtun shing can dang stobs can dang // nam gru dga' byed /
translated: (He is) Musala, and Balin, and Revatī, and one who delights.

original: dga' ba can //
analyzed: dga' ba can //
translated: (He is) Revatī, and one who delights.🔽(He is) Kāmadeva, and Madhu, and Śuddha, and Supāraga, and one whose hand is a skull.

original: 'dod skyong / sbrang rtsi dag pa dang // legs 'gugs dang ni thod (khyab 'jug gi phu bo'i ming sum cu so lnga/) pa'i lag / legs dga' mthong ldan /🔽t'a la 'dzin //
analyzed: 'dod skyong / sbrang rtsi dag pa dang // legs 'gugs dang ni thod (khyab 'jug gi phu bo'i ming sum cu so lnga/) pa'i lag / legs dga' mthong ldan /🔽t'a la 'dzin //
translated: (He is) one who delights in good seeing, and one who holds a palm tree.

original: (ha yi/) rna rgyan gcig pa sngon rabs pa //
analyzed: (ha yi/) rna rgyan gcig pa sngon rabs pa //
translated: One-Eared, Ancient,

original: gshol ldan gser can 'joms 'jigs byed //
analyzed: gshol ldan gser can 'joms 'jigs byed //
translated: Plow, Golden, Destroyer, Fearful,

original: mchog sbas dang ni snar ma skye //
analyzed: mchog sbas dang ni snar ma skye //

original: mi 'dzeg ston skyes kun dga' dang // bzang stobs /
analyzed: mi 'dzeg ston skyes kun dga' dang // bzang stobs /

original: gshol 'dzin / gshol la dga' //
analyzed: gshol 'dzin / gshol la dga' //

original: k'a li nidh'i 'joms /
analyzed: k'a li nidh'i 'joms /

analyzed: lhag ma dang // k'a lindh'i 'gugs mtha' yas so /

analyzed: 35 /'di yi chung ma nam gru ma //

analyzed: sbrang rtsi dmar ser can ma'o /

analyzed: snang gsal ('dam kha/) ('od zer sbyi'i ming/) zhes dang / rab gsal dang // snang ba /

original: ku gdung / shin tu gsal /🔽6 /'od drag /
analyzed: ku gdung / shin tu gsal / 6 /'od drag /
translated: “Very clear” and “shining” are synonyms for “very bright.”

original: nges sreg byed pa dang // tshad pas /
analyzed: nges sreg byed pa dang // tshad pas /
translated: “Strong light” and “fierce” are synonyms for “very bright.”🔽“Definitely burning” and “hot” are synonyms for “very hot.”

analyzed: kun tu gdung ba'o // drod dang / rab tshe / tsha drag rno /
translated: “All-consuming” and “burning” are synonyms for “very hot.”🔽“Warmth” and “very hot” are synonyms for “hot.”

original: 4 / shin tu dro dang / tsha ba la //
analyzed: 4 / shin tu dro dang / tsha ba la //
translated: “Very hot” and “hot” are synonyms for “very hot.”

original: mi bzad pa dang // gtum pa'o /
analyzed: mi bzad pa dang // gtum pa'o /
translated: “Unbearable” and “fierce” are synonyms for “very hot.”

original: 2 / cung zad dro dang / bag tsam dro //🔽'jam dro can ni /
analyzed: 2 / cung zad dro dang / bag tsam dro // 'jam dro can ni /
translated: “Slightly warm” and “a little warm” are synonyms for “warm.”🔽“Gentle warmth” is a synonym for “slightly warm.”

original: cung dro'o / 4 / tshad gdung rlabs ni /
analyzed: cung dro'o / 4 / tshad gdung rlabs ni /

original: dzha l'a'o // ri dgas sred dang smig rgyu'o //
analyzed: dzha l'a'o // ri dgas sred dang smig rgyu'o //
translated: “Deer’s craving” and “mirage” are synonyms for “heat wave.”

original: char pa 'dor ba'i nyi 'od ni //
analyzed: char pa 'dor ba'i nyi 'od ni //

analyzed: brgya phrag / bzhi pa'i 'od du 'gyur //

analyzed: ba mo brgya pa'i khab 'beb //

analyzed: re zhig tshad pa 'dor bar byed //
